base_frame.description: The reference coordinate frame for the base.

unit_axis.description: The primary axis used for unit vector computations.

max_iterations.description: The maximum number of iterations for the segmentation algorithm.

plane_slope_threshold.description: Maximum allowable slope angle for detected planes (in degrees).

voxel_size_z.description: Voxel grid size in the Z direction.

height_threshold.description: Height difference threshold for plane segmentation.

debug.description: Enable debug mode for additional logging and output.

publish_processing_time_detail.description: Enable publishing of detailed processing time for debugging.
